author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: I am shocked about how much I like this set
review:
Opening;

The Han Solo in carbonite keyring upon reveal was a promotion i was very harsh on but man was I wrong .

The "Minifigure" I guess-

He is just the carbonite Han solo part moulded in a metal that I do not know the name of , with his creased shirt , smooth hair , uncomfortable facial expression and the side consoles and obviously the ring it's self .

The packaging -

Now if you have ever read one of my reviews you know that I do not talk about the packaging or the instructions , it comes in a sleek matte finished black box featuring only the Lego star wars logo and the inside has padding and an exact slot for the keyring , it is incredibly high quality .

In conclusion -

this is amazing , when it was revealed I thought 'oh great , another non physical set star wars promo ' but I was wrong it feels so professional and high quality Lego clearly put their all into it , let's hope MM4GA (make may 4th great again ) comes to fruition next year and it is as high quality as this , but that may 4th promo should be a figure not another diorama so I recommend this set so much but it had a limited quantity and is already worth a fair bit on the secondary market .
